Package org.consensusj.jsonrpc.introspection

Interface JsonRpcServiceWrapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonRpcService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJsonRpcService, DelegatingJsonRpcService, EchoJsonRpcService, MathService, WalletAppKitJsonRpcService

    public interface JsonRpcServiceWrapper
extends JsonRpcService

    Interface to wrap a Java class with JsonRpc support.

      • call

        default <R> CompletableFuture<JsonRpcResponse<R>> call(JsonRpcRequest req)

        Handle a request by calling method, getting a result, and embedding it in response.

        Specified by:
        call in interface JsonRpcService
        Parameters:
        req - The Request POJO
        Returns:
        A future JSON RPC Response

      • resultCompletionHandler

        default <T> JsonRpcResponse<T> resultCompletionHandler(JsonRpcRequest req,
                                                       T result,
                                                       Throwable ex)

        Map a request plus a result or error into a response

        Parameters:
        req - The request being services
        result - A result object or null
        ex - exception or null
        Returns:
        A success or error response as appropriate

      • exceptionToError

        default JsonRpcError exceptionToError(Throwable ex)

        Map an exception (typically from callMethod) to an Error POJO

        Parameters:
        ex - Exception returned from "unwrapped" method
        Returns:
        An error POJO for insertion in a JsonRpcResponse

      • callMethod

        default <R> CompletableFuture<R> callMethod(String methodName,
                                            List<Object> params)

        Call an "unwrapped" method from an existing service object

        Parameters:
        methodName - Method to call
        params - List of JSON-RPC parameters
        Returns:
        A future result POJO

      • reflect

        static Map<String,Method> reflect(Class<?> apiClass)

        Use reflection/introspection to generate a map of methods. Generally this is called from the constructor of implementing classes.

        Parameters:
        apiClass - The service class to reflect/introspect
        Returns:
        a map of method names to method objects

      • wrapResult

        static <T> JsonRpcResponse<T> wrapResult(JsonRpcRequest req,
                                         T result)

        Wrap a Result POJO in a JsonRpcResponse

        Parameters:
        req - The request we are responding to
        result - the result to wrap
        Returns:
        A valid JsonRpcResponse
